text:
something for you <@U22PNRAJD>?

I think could be related with using the CM in a flex column instead directly in a row of template (so it is not used in the template but in the content editor)
Wow, nice find. Can you send me a link by chance?
Can you send me a link? Thanks!

Hey another issue here I was struggling with:
In the icon of HS when you are visiting a publish page (.hs-sprocket on top right). The link to edit advanced menus still linking to the old menu editor. I didn't noticed and changed there some text but the changes weren't published until I noticed that and moved to the new settings page and redo the changes.
We fixed all of the templates that same night...did you still want the link?
